title: Administrator Others
blurb:
The candidate should have the below skills:
1.Work experience as a Python Developer
2.Write reusable, testable, and efficient code
3.Expertise in at least one popular Python framework (like Django, Flask or Pyramid)
4.Knowledge of object-relational mapping (ORM)
5.Familiarity with front-end technologies (like JavaScript and HTML5)
6.Support new projects and implement solutions from a Level-3 perspective
7.Develop back-end components to improve responsiveness and overall performance
8.Design and implementation of low-latency, high-availability, and performant applications
9.Integration of user-facing elements developed by front-end developers with server-side logic
10.Integration of data storage solutions may include databases, key-value stores, blob stores, etc
11.Test and debug programs & Implement security and data protection solutions
12.Coordinate with internal teams to understand user requirements and provide technical solutions

Additional needed things:
1. The candidate may have knowledge into CI/CD like Jenkins and able to build and deploy the code efficiently.
2. Must have knowledge in Docker and Kubernetes and maintaining the pods and blue green deployments.
3. Should work efficiently with Openshift clusters and the complete knowledge on the openshift jobs.
4. He/She must have work experience in any one of the clous providers like AWS/GCP/Azure.
5. Candidate should have better understanding and exposure of Agile principles and ITIL process.
6. Strong knowledge into Networking concepts (TCP/IP/UDP/DNS etc) and able to understnd the reqirements from the network teams and needed to automate their daily tasks
using python.
